item.title: AerCap 首席执行官警告说，关税可能阻碍波音公司的现金回收
item.description: 全球最大的飞机租赁公司 AerCap 的负责人周一表示，美国当选总统唐纳德-特朗普可能提出的新贸易关税可能会打击供应链，阻碍波音公司创造急需现金的努力。【原文：The head of the world’s largest aircraft leasing company, AerCap , said on Monday that potential new trade tariffs floated by U.S. President-elect Donald Trump could hit supply chains and hinder efforts by Boeing to generate much-needed cash.】

item.title: 早间竞价标准普尔500指数抹去大选后涨幅，债券问题缠身
item.description: Mike Dolan 展望美国和全球市场的未来一天【原文：A look at the day ahead in U.S. and global markets from Mike Dolan】

item.title: 医疗保健交易商看好特朗普第二任期内的并购复苏
item.description: 本周，医疗保健行业的交易商们齐聚旧金山，参加该行业最重要的年度会议，他们表示，由于当选总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）可能会减少反垄断审查，预计超过 100 亿美元的交易将再次出现。【原文：Healthcare dealmakers gathering in San Francisco for the industry's premier annual conference this week say they expect a resurgence of deals exceeding $10 billion due to the potential for less antitrust scrutiny under President-elect Donald Trump.】

item.title: 中国和德国需求疲软，宝马集团年销量下滑
item.description: 宝马公司周一公布的年销售额下降，与德国同行一样，受到全球最大汽车市场中国和德国经济疲软的拖累。【原文：BMW posted a drop in annual sales on Monday, joining its German peers in reporting numbers weighed down by economic weakness in China, the world's largest car market, and Germany.】

item.title: 投资者情绪转为负面，美国炼油企业为艰难的一年做好准备
item.description: 投资者正在对美国炼油行业产生负面影响，原因是预测燃料需求将走软，以及担心当选总统唐纳德-特朗普可能会对进口原油征收关税。【原文：Investors are souring on the U.S. oil refining sector, citing forecasts for softer fuel demand and worries that President-elect Donald Trump may slap tariffs on imports of crude.】

item.title: 强劲的美国经济可能不需要特朗普的大改革
item.description: 美国当选总统唐纳德-特朗普在竞选时承诺要大力征收进口关税、严格限制移民、放松管制和缩小政府规模，但他下周接手的经济可能会呼唤不同的东西。【原文：U.S. President-elect Donald Trump campaigned on promises of aggressive import tariffs, strict immigration curbs, deregulation and smaller government, but the economy he inherits next week may be screaming for something different.】

item.title: 美国银行利润可能因交易费和交易量增加而增长
item.description: 在第四季度强劲的交易和交易活动的推动下，美国银行本周可能会公布更强劲的盈利报告。【原文：U.S. banks will probably report stronger earnings this week, fueled by robust dealmaking and trading in the fourth quarter.】

item.title: Truveta 向 Regeneron 和 Illumina 出售股份，以建立基因数据库
item.description: 医疗数据研究公司 Truveta 周一表示，作为建立全球最大基因数据库交易的一部分，Regeneron 制药公司、Illumina 公司和 17 家美国医疗系统将以 3.2 亿美元入股该公司。【原文：Medical data research company Truveta said on Monday that Regeneron Pharmaceuticals , Illumina and 17 U.S. health systems will take a $320 million stake in the company as part of a deal to build the world's largest genetic database.】

item.title: 美国的人工智能芯片新规将如何运作
item.description: 该规则对最尖端的人工智能应用所需的美国人工智能芯片和技术的流动进行监管。【原文：The rule regulates the flow of American AI chips and technology needed for the most sophisticated AI applications.】

item.title: 美国加强对全球人工智能芯片流动的控制
item.description: 美国政府周一表示，将进一步限制人工智能芯片和技术的出口，在全球范围内进行分工，将先进的计算能力留在美国及其盟国，同时寻找更多方法阻止中国进入美国。【原文：The U.S. government said on Monday it would further restrict artificial intelligence chip and technology exports, divvying up the world to keep advanced computing power in the U.S. and among its allies while finding more ways to block China's access.】

item.title: 英伟达称新规定将削弱美国在人工智能领域的领导地位
item.description: 英伟达（Nvidia）周一批评了拜登政府为加强华盛顿对全球人工智能芯片流动的控制而做出的新努力，称这一规定将危及美国目前在人工智能领域的领先地位。【原文：Nvidia on Monday criticized a new effort by the Biden administration to tighten Washington's grip on artificial intelligence chip flows around the world, saying the regulation would jeopardize current U.S. leadership in AI.】

item.title: 澳门投资者是陷入困境的星空娱乐第二大股东
item.description: 周一的一份证券交易所文件显示，澳门的一位人士已成为赌场运营商星际娱乐公司的第二大股东，持有这家陷入困境的澳大利亚公司超过 5.5% 的股份。【原文：A Macau-based individual has become the second-biggest shareholder in casino operator Star Entertainment by building a stake of more than 5.5% in the embattled Australian company, a stock exchange filing showed on Monday.】

item.title: 对冲基金在周五美国就业报告公布前增加了看跌押注，银行称
item.description: 摩根士丹利（Morgan Stanley）和高盛（Goldman Sachs）在周五的报告中称，截至1月9日的上周，在美国就业报告引发华尔街抛售之前，全球对冲基金增加了对美股的押注。【原文：Global hedge funds added more bets against U.S. stocks over the last week through Jan 9, ahead of a blowout U.S. jobs report that sparked a sell-off on Wall Street, Morgan Stanley and Goldman Sachs said in notes on Friday.】

item.title: SBB 债券持有人撤销对地产集团的诉讼
item.description: 瑞典 SBB 公司周一表示，其债权人美国对冲基金 Fir Tree Partners 将结束有关从该地产集团收回剩余 750 万欧元票据（767 万美元）的法律程序。【原文：Sweden's SBB said on Monday that its creditor U.S. hedge fund Fir Tree Partners would end its legal proceedings in relation to recovering its remaining 7.5 million euros of notes ($7.67 million) from the property group.】

item.title: 协会数据显示 2025 年中国汽车出口增长将放缓
item.description: 中国汽车工业协会（CAAM）周一的数据显示，今年中国汽车出口预计将增长5.8%，达到620万辆，较2024年19.3%的增幅有所降温。【原文：China's vehicle exports are expected to grow 5.8% to 6.2 million units this year, cooling from a 19.3% increase in 2024, data from the China Association of Automobile Manufacturers (CAAM) showed on Monday.】

item.title: 报道称德国商业银行董事长认为友好合并联合信贷银行的可能性很小
item.description: 据《德国商报》报道，德国商业银行监事会主席延斯-魏德曼（Jens Weidmann）表示，在意大利裕信银行出人意料地收购了这家德国银行的大量股份之后，与裕信银行友好合并的可能性微乎其微。【原文：Commerzbank's supervisory board chairman Jens Weidmann said there is little chance for an amicable merger with UniCredit after the Italian bank's surprise purchase of a hefty stake in the German lender, Handelsblatt newspaper reported.】

item.title: 保时捷 2024 年在华销量下降 28
item.description: 德国跑车制造商保时捷公司（Porsche AG）周一报告称，由于全球最大汽车市场的持续疲软对德国汽车制造商造成了冲击，2024 年在中国的销量下降了 28%。【原文：German sports car maker Porsche AG reported a 28% tumble in 2024 China sales on Monday, as persistent weakness in the world's largest car market hit German carmakers.】

item.title: 葛兰素史克将以不超过 11.5 亿美元的价格收购美国生物技术公司 IDRx
item.description: 英国制药商葛兰素史克公司（GSK）周一表示，将支付最高11.5亿美元收购总部位于波士顿的生物制药公司IDRx。【原文：British drugmaker GSK said on Monday that it would pay up to $1.15 billion to buy Boston-based biopharmaceutical firm IDRx, which is developing a treatment for a rare type of tumour.】

item.title: 据德国《金融时报》报道，汉莎航空首席执行官预计意大利 ITA 航空公司将增加数亿利润
item.description: 汉莎航空首席执行官卡斯滕-施波尔（Carsten Spohr）周一在接受《FAZ》报采访时表示，汉莎航空计划入股意大利 ITA 航空公司，预计将在未来几年为这家德国旗舰航空公司增加数亿欧元的利润。【原文：Lufthansa expects its planned stake in Italy's ITA Airways to increase the German flagship carrier's profits by hundreds of millions of euros in the coming years, Chief Executive Carsten Spohr told the FAZ newspaper in an interview published on Monday.】

item.title: 贝索斯的蓝色起源公司准备首次发射 "新格伦 "火箭
item.description: 杰夫-贝索斯（Jeff Bezos）的蓝色起源公司（Blue Origin）准备于周一早些时候在佛罗里达州首次发射其 "新格伦"（New Glenn）火箭，这将是该公司在地球轨道上的一次关键性首次亮相，标志着该公司朝着期待已久的目标迈出了重要一步，即在卫星发射市场上与埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）的太空探索技术公司（SpaceX）展开竞争。【原文：Jeff Bezos' Blue Origin prepared for the inaugural launch of its New Glenn rocket from Florida early on Monday, nearing a pivotal debut in Earth orbit that will mark a major step towards a long-awaited goal of competing with Elon Musk's SpaceX in the satellite launch market.】

item.title: 欧洲银行创纪录的收入助长并购言论，行业压力持续存在
item.description: 多年来，欧洲银行和资产管理公司为更好地与美国竞争对手竞争而壮大规模的压力与日俱增。高管、顾问和投资者表示，今年可能是一个转折点，因为有更多的董事会在探索合并。【原文：For years, pressure on European banks and asset managers to bulk up to better compete with U.S. rivals has been mounting. This year may mark a turning point as more boardrooms explore combinations, say executives, advisers and investors.】

item.title: 独家报道消息人士称，美国调查发现中国不公平地主导造船业，为处罚铺平道路
item.description: 三位熟悉长达数月之久的贸易调查结果的消息人士告诉路透社，美国总统乔-拜登（Joe Biden）的政府已经得出结论，中国利用不公平的政策和做法主导了全球海运、物流和造船行业。【原文：U.S. President Joe Biden's administration has concluded that China uses unfair policies and practices to dominate the global maritime, logistics and shipbuilding sectors, three sources familiar with the results of a months-long trade investigation told Reuters.】

item.title: 分析师称，随着矿山关闭和中国电动汽车销售缓解供应过剩，2025 年锂价将趋于稳定
item.description: 分析师和交易商表示，由于关闭的矿山和中国强劲的电动汽车销售消化了供应过剩，锂价在经历两年的急剧下跌后，有望在2025年企稳，不过矿山重新开放的可能性可能会限制涨幅。【原文：Lithium prices are expected to stabilise in 2025 after two years of steep declines as shuttered mines and robust electric vehicle sales in China soak up an oversupply, although the potential for mines to reopen may cap gains, analysts and traders said.】

item.title: 早间竞标忘记软着陆，继续飞行
item.description: 韦恩-科尔对欧洲和全球市场未来一天的展望。【原文：A look at the day ahead in European and global markets from Wayne Cole.】

item.title: 澳大利亚明星娱乐公司在跌至历史最低点后缩减亏损
item.description: 澳大利亚赌场运营商 Star Entertainment 的股价周一跳涨 13.6%，分析师认为股价上涨是由于投资者在该股上周跌至历史新低后以更低的价格买入了该股。【原文：Shares of Australian casino operator Star Entertainment jumped 13.6% higher on Monday, with analysts citing the rise to investors buying the stock at a cheaper price after it fell to a record low last week.】

item.title: 人工智能芯片需求强劲，台积电第四季度利润大增 58
item.description: 台湾中芯国际集成电路制造股份有限公司（Taiwan Semiconductor Manufacturing Co.【原文：Taiwan Semiconductor Manufacturing Co , the main global producer of advanced chips used in artificial intelligence applications, is expected to report a 58% leap in fourth-quarter profit on Thursday because of surging demand.】

item.title: 贸易风险下中国出口增长加快，进口出人意料
item.description: 12 月份，中国的出口增长加快，进口也有所恢复，在世界第二大经济体准备应对与即将上任的美国政府之间日益加剧的贸易风险之际，中国以积极的态势结束了今年的经济增长。【原文：China's export growth picked up steam in December, while imports recovered, closing out the year on a positive note as the world's second-largest economy braces for mounting trade risks with the incoming U.S. administration.】

item.title: 中国加强政策措施捍卫脆弱的人民币
item.description: 周一，在人民币兑美元汇率徘徊在16个月低点附近之际，中国放宽了允许更多离岸借款的规定，并发出口头警告，加大了政策措施的力度，以捍卫不断走软的人民币。【原文：China stepped up its policy measures on Monday to defend a weakening yuan by relaxing rules to allow more offshore borrowing and sending verbal warnings as the Chinese currency hovered around 16-month lows against a strong dollar.】

item.title: 赞成 Chemist Warehouse-Sigma Healthcare 58 亿美元交易的所有权事宜
item.description: 代理权咨询公司 Ownership Matters 周一表示，建议 Sigma Healthcare 的股东投票支持 Chemist Warehouse 对该制药公司的反向收购，理由是股东价值巨大。【原文：Proxy advisory firm Ownership Matters said on Monday it recommends that shareholders of Sigma Healthcare vote in favour of Chemist Warehouse's reverse takeover of the pharmaceutical company, citing significant shareholder value.】

item.title: 开发商收到清算申请后，中国世茂下跌 15
item.description: 中国房地产开发商世茂集团收到清盘申请后，其股价周一下跌 15%，至 0.73 港元，为 9 月 26 日以来最低。【原文：Shares of China's Shimao Group dropped 15% to HK$0.73 on Monday, their lowest since Sept. 26, after the property developer received a liquidation petition.】
